snippet: Five people, found guilty in 1997, had been imprisoned for more than 17 years in the fatal shooting of a livery cabdriver.
abstract: Murder convictions of five people found guilty in the 1995 shooting of  Baithe Diop, a livery-cab driver, will be vacated; defendants Eric Glisson and Cathy Watkins, released in October pending the reinvestigation, have been told that their convictions will be dropped.
lead_paragraph: Five people, found guilty in 1997, had been imprisoned for more than 17 years in the fatal shooting of a livery cabdriver.

headline.seo: Convictions in ’95 Killing of Cabdriver to Be Thrown Out
headline.main: Convictions in ’95 Killing of Cabdriver to Be Vacated
headline.print_headline: 5 Convictions In ’95 Killing To Be Vacated
